title: International Graphic Design Forums?
content:
Hey

I was wondering if anybody on here uses any other forums or discussion boards? Im thinking about moving abroad (The Netherlands) and pursuing a career in design...are there any suitable places for me to discuss the pros and cons of this? Thanks

 [‹ glueing paper together at edges?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193332/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43155 "Go to previous forum topic") [Adobe Font Folio Education Essentials ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193332/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43110 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j. cullen

comments.content:
Hi James,  
I took a quick look at the ’MeetUp’ site and found that there’s a group of designers, photographers, developers and more, that meets in a coffee shop in Rotterdam. Here’s a link to their members page - might be worth getting in touch with a few. Hope this helps, good luck on your plans.

[http://newmedia.meetup.com/79/members/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704193332/http:/newmedia.meetup.com/79/members/ "http://newmedia.meetup.com/79/members/")

Thanks David

Il certainly look into that
